name: Mykhailo Nikolaichuk
label: Software Engineer
summary: Software engineer specializing in Python automation and internal tool development, with experience in Flask web applications and building efficient, user-centric software solutions.

work_experience.summary: Working as a Python SDET on firmware automation and internal framework for a client that produce IoT devices.
highlights: Expanded internal automation framework to support new IoT devices and its capabilities

work_experience.summary: Worked as a Python Software Engineer on automation tools and internal frameworks for a client developing multimedia and IoT devices.
highlights: Developed a tool to capture build state using an internal framework with data and screenshot collection
Stored and visualized data using Flask and AWS, with output via FastAPI or Jinja2-based PDF export
Expanded internal automation framework to support new IoT devices
Creating and managing various GitLab pipelines and Jenkins jobs for CI/CD integration
Built wrappers and classes for executing 3rd-party API calls within the internal framework

work_experience.summary: Worked as a Python/JS QA Automation Engineer focusing on automation for mobile platforms.
highlights: Developed automation scripts for iOS and Android devices
Contributed to migrating internal automation tools from JavaScript to Python
Created a VueJS-based web dashboard to visualize automation script statistics

projects.title: Steam Market Crawler
projects.summary: Bot that monitors Steam and 3rd-party marketplaces for undervalued skins with specific charm patterns.
highlights: Monitors Steam, CSFloat, DMarket, and CSMoney
Twice per day perform deep scan of charm and visualizes pattern/price diagrams
Sends instant Telegram notifications for good deals
Runs 24/7 using cron jobs on a Raspberry Pi 4

skills.name: FastAPI, Playwright, Selenium, SQLAlchemy, Jenkins, Gitlab, Linux

interests.name: Cycling
interests.summary: I love ride my bike, no matter where, no matter when.

interests.name: Gaming
interests.summary: I used to play competetive games like WoW and LoL, now I'm more into co-op or story games.
